I am a software engineer currently based in Los Angeles, CA. In May 2017, I graduated from UC Berkeley with a B.S. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.

Relevant courses that I have taken:

  • Communication Networks
  • Digital Design and Integrated Circuits (ASIC)
  • Computer Graphics
  • Data Science
  • Machine Learning
  • Databases Systems
  • Computer Security
  • Operating Systems and System Programming
  • Algorithms
  • Discrete Mathematics and Probability Theory
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Machine Structures
  • Data Structures
  • Designing Information Devices and Systems I/II

I also enjoy editing videos. I was part of a Korean broadcasting station on campus (BerKast). If you know Korean, I strongly recommend to watch our videos - a lot of cool contents that I am very proud of being part of.

Besides taking photos and editing videos, I love solving jigsaw puzzles, riding my bike to the beach, and listening to instrumentals from movies or dramas.
